content:
Hi,

I saw that the latest IPS build includes a ValueSet specifically for the SNOMED GPS codes (http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/ValueSet/snomed-intl-gps). This is just what I need for another use case. Is this VS intended only for use specifically within the IPS or can it be used more broadly? If the former, are there alternatives?
the value set can be used more broadly
under the terms of the SNOMED CT GPS set of codes
Yes, we added it to make it available for the IPS and for general use.
